title: Minecraft装了java但还是无法启动
author: 回忆_
txt_content:
Minecraft装了java但还是无法启动!!!
错误报告:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Hi. I'm Minecraft, and I'm a crashaholic.

Description: Initializing game

谢谢.已经可以启动了
